actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: To repeal the so-called Forest Service Appeals Reform Act and to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service in the same manner as other Federal land management agencies.
short_title: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003

summary.text: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003 - Repeals the Appeals Reform Act.Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service.

titles.title: Forest Protection and Wildfire Prevention Act of 2003

To repeal the so-called Forest Service Appeals Reform Act and to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to develop an administrative appeals process for the Forest Service in the same manner as other Federal land management agencies.
